member.summary: The source property.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryCountProperty
member.summary: The retry count property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryCount
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets number of retries.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryDelayProperty
member.summary: The retry delay property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.RetryDelay
member.summary: If image loading fails automatically retry it a number of times, with a specific delay. Sets delay in milliseconds between each trial

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.LoadingDelayProperty
member.summary: The loading delay property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.LoadingDelay
member.summary: Sets delay in milliseconds before image loading

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleWidthProperty
member.summary: The downsample width property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleWidth
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleWidth parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this width while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleHeightProperty
member.summary: The downsample height property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleHeight
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Optional DownsampleHeight parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this height while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleToViewSizeProperty
member.summary: The downsample to view size property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleToViewSize
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. DownsampleWidth and DownsampleHeight properties will be automatically set to view size If the view height or width will not return > 0 - it'll fall back to using DownsampleWidth / DownsampleHeight properties values IMPORTANT: That property is tricky when using some auto-layouts as view doesn't have its size defined, so it's always safe to have DownsampleWidth / DownsampleHeight set as a fallback
member.value: true if downsample to view size; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleUseDipUnitsProperty
member.summary: The downsample use dip units property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.DownsampleUseDipUnits
member.summary: If set to true DownsampleWidth and DownsampleHeight properties will use density independent pixels for downsampling
member.value: true if downsample use dip units; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.CacheDurationProperty
member.summary: The cache duration property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.CacheDuration
member.summary: How long the file will be cached on disk.

member.summary: The loading priority property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.LoadingPriority
member.summary: Defines the loading priority, the default is LoadingPriority.Normal

member.summary: The fade animation for cached images enabled property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationForCachedImages
member.summary: Indicates if the fade animation effect for cached images should be enabled. By default this value comes from ImageService.Instance.Config.FadeAnimationForCachedImages.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationEnabledProperty
member.summary: The fade animation enabled property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if the fade animation effect should be enabled. By default this value comes from ImageService.Instance.Config.FadeAnimationEnabled.

member.name: F:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationDurationProperty
member.summary: The fade animation duration property.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Forms.CachedImage.FadeAnimationDuration
member.summary: Sets fade animation effect duration. By default this value comes from ImageService.Instance.Config.FadeAnimationDuration.
